<rule id="java-removals-00120" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="sun.misc.BASE64{encoder-decoder}{*}"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="The `sun.misc.BASE64{encoder-decoder}` class has been removed">
                    <message>
                        The `sun.misc.BASE64{encoder-decoder}` class has been removed.  
                        It can be replaced with `Base64.{encoder-decoder}` class instantiated using `java.util.Base64.getMime{encoder-decoder}()` method.  
                        For further examples on how to replace the `BASE64{encoder-decoder}` class with `Base64.{encoder-decoder}` one, refer to the "Code example" link below.  
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/11/docs/api/java.base/java/util/Base64.html" title="java.util.Base64 - Javadoc"/>
                    <link href="https://hg.openjdk.java.net/jdk8/jdk8/jdk/rev/9078c34437ab" title="Code example"/>
                    <link href="https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8006182" title="OpenJDK - Original enhancement request"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="encoder-decoder">
                <matches pattern="(Encoder|Decoder)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
